summary: Ride your horse in first person!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff5500][b]6/1/12 7:53 PM EST
Version 0.7 Released! FOLLOW NEW INSTRUCTIONS[/b]
Please try/comment/endorse.
Note - This mod is still in beta.
[/COLOR]

NOTICE - 6/1/12 - the newest patch (1.6) makes this mod completely unusable.  A workaround has not yet been discovered.

[youtube]Vvn_Vec3Iv0[/youtube]

Featured:
[youtube]GJ2noz4-BBM[/youtube]

CHANGE LOG

0.7 - Fast travel while on horse disabled in scripted version until I find a solution to a potential bug.
0.6 - Scripted version released
0.2 - Simple version A and B released

[color=aqua][u]INSTRUCTIONS[/u][/COLOR]

1. (Optional) Remove previous versions of the mod and optionally create new clean saves.

2. Download Latest Version

3. Copy the archived files to the Skyrim Data folder (should be something like C:\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data)

4. Enable mod (horsefp.esp) via the Skyrim Startup Menu

5. IMPORTANT - Load a save then enter a dungeon or cave.  Exit the dungeon.

6. Get on a horse and zoom/scroll in all the way.

7. Enjoy.

[color=yellow][b]TROUBLESHOOTING/MODIFICATION[/b][/COLOR]

- This mod is not compatible with some other over-the-shoulder mods
- Try disabling all other mods that may create camera adjustments
- To adjust the camera position when on a horse edit the INI file that comes with the mod....
fOverShoulderHorseAddY = increase as needed
fActorFadeOutLimit = increase as needed
- In the rare case that the player becomes invisible after dismounting the horse (and thus sequence of the script was somehow altered) please download the optional (bug fix) file and extract it to the Skyrim\\Data directory to overwrite the old one.  Load game, hop on then off horse, make a new save now that the game has been corrected, then reinstall extract mod if desired.

[color=#ff00ff][b]Special thanks to the following for their input and help in the development of this mod:
Ghost, porroone, Snakeman, MastaWizard, dotSilver, Perked, lewis2329, VoodooRising[/b][/color]
